content: this scarf is knit with worsted weight yarn using us8 5mm needles the pattern is reversible matches asherton hat http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/asherton-hat 1 http //smariek blogspot com/2006/09/asherton-hat html 2 stitch patterns used in this pattern are mentioned in the **pattern post** here http //smariek blogspot com/2006/09/asherton-reversible-scarf html 3 and also in the **pattern bibliography** post here http //smariek blogspot com/2007/11/pattern-bibliography html 4 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/asherton-hat 2 http //smariek blogspot com/2006/09/asherton-hat html 3 http //smariek blogspot com/2006/09/asherton-reversible-scarf html 4 http //smariek blogspot com/2007/11/pattern-bibliography html
